thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan spotted with Real Madrid jersey
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan spotted with Real Madrid jersey

title: Shah Rukh Khan spotted with Real Madrid jersey
text:
Shah Rukh Khan spotted with Real Madrid jersey 
Shah Rukh Khan Indian Bollywood actor Getty Images 0 09-Jan-2017 19:13:07 Bollywood actor Shah Rukh Khan was seen holding a Real Madrid jersey which read the number '555'. 
Superstar Shah Rukh Khan, an avid follower of sports and owner of Indian Premier League side Kolkata Knight Riders, was seen showing his support for the Spanish giants, Real Madrid. The 51-year-old was presented with an honourary jersey from the club. The jersey contained the number '555' on the back, which is believed to the most liked digit of King Khan. 
Posting on social media platform, Real Madrid stated that they are fortunate to have Shah Rukh as one of their fans from India. 
The world of football has witnessed several celebrities showing their interest in the game. Right from John Abraham, co-owner of Indian Super League franchise NorthEast United FC, to Abhishek Bachchan, co-owner of The Super Machans, many Bollywood stars have been related to football. 
With Los Blancos gifting Mr. Khan the special jersey, the club can expect a rise in their number of Indian supporters. Competitions
